00033 #include <tclap/CmdLine.h>
00034 
00035 #include "itkImageFileReader.h"
00036 #include "itkImageFileWriter.h"
00037 
00038 #include "itkImage.h"
00039 
00040 #include <iostream>
00041 #include <fstream>
00042 
00043 #include <string>
00044 #include <iomanip>
00045 
00046 #include <map>
00047 
00048 
00049 
00050 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00051 {
00052 
00053 try {  
00054 
00055   TCLAP::CmdLine cmd("Command description message", ' ', "1.0", true);
00056 
00057   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> inputImageArg("i","image_file","input image file (short)",true,"","string");
00058   cmd.add( inputImageArg );
00059   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> inputTableArg("t","table_file","input look up table file (ascii)",true,"","string");
00060   cmd.add( inputTableArg );
00061   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> outputImageArg("o","output_file","output image file (short)",true,"","string");
00062   cmd.add( outputImageArg );
00063 
00064   // Parse the args.
00065   cmd.parse( argc, argv );
00066 
00067   // Get the value parsed by each arg. 
00068   std::string image_file = inputImageArg.getValue();
00069   std::string table_file = inputTableArg.getValue();
00070   std::string output_file = outputImageArg.getValue();
00071 
00072   //ITK declaration
00073   typedef short PixelType;
00074   const   unsigned int        Dimension = 3;
00075   typedef itk::Image< PixelType, Dimension >    ImageType;
00076   typedef itk::ImageFileReader< ImageType >  ReaderType;
00077   typedef itk::ImageFileWriter< ImageType >  WriterType;
00078 
00079   std::cout<<"Reading the input file\n";
00080   ReaderType::Pointer image_reader = ReaderType::New();
00081   image_reader->SetFileName( image_file  );
00082   image_reader->Update();
00083 
00084   ImageType::Pointer input_image = image_reader->GetOutput();
00085   ImageType::Pointer output_image = image_reader->GetOutput();  //by default, the output image is set to the input image
00086 
00087   std::ifstream lookupTableFile(table_file.c_str(), std::ios::in);  // on ouvre le fichier en lecture
00088   std::map<PixelType, PixelType> lookupTable;
00089 
00090   std::cout<<"Loading the look-up table\n";
00091   PixelType index = 0;
00092   PixelType value = 0;
00093   while( !lookupTableFile.eof() ){
00094     lookupTableFile >> index;
00095     lookupTableFile >> value;
00096     lookupTable[index] = value;
00097   }
00098 
00099   typedef itk::ImageRegionIterator< ImageType > Iterator;
00100   Iterator itData( input_image, input_image->GetRequestedRegion() );
00101   Iterator itOutput( output_image, output_image->GetRequestedRegion() );
00102 
00103   for(itData.GoToBegin(), itOutput.GoToBegin(); !itData.IsAtEnd(); ++itData, ++itOutput)
00104     itOutput.Set( lookupTable.find( itData.Get() )->second  );
00105     
00106   lookupTableFile.close();
00107   std::cout<<"Writing the output image\n";
00108   WriterType::Pointer writer = WriterType::New();
00109   writer->SetFileName( output_file ); 
00110   writer->SetInput( output_image ); 
00111   writer->Update();
00112 
00113   return 1;
00114 
00115   } catch (TCLAP::ArgException &e)  // catch any exceptions
00116   { std::cerr << "error: " << e.error() << " for arg " << e.argId() << std::endl; }
00117 
00118 }
